item.title: SnowHydro2022: Adaptation of a snow cover scheme for complex topography areas: regional calibration over High Mountain Asia and application in global models

item.title: Réchauffement exacerbé dans les Hautes Montagnes d’Asie
item.description:
Suite à la sortie de mon premier article scientifique sur le changement climatique en Himalaya et sur le Plateau Tibétain (en utilisant la dernière génération de modèles CMIP6), voici un résumé grand public publié par mon laboratoire : https://www.ige-grenoble.fr/Rechauffement-exacerbe-dans-les

Article scientifique : Climate change in the High Mountain Asia in CMIP6

item.title: Validation of HMASR with snow depth stations
item.description:
Data

  • HMASR: High Mountain Asia UCLA Daily Snow Reanalysis, Version 1
  • snow depth stations: Observational snow depth dataset of the Tibetan Plateau (Version 1.0) (1961-2013)

Map HMASR / stations

Click on the map bellow to access the interactive page ⤵️

All scripts and data can be found here: https://github.com/mickaellalande/PhD/tree/master/SCF_parameterizations/1_validation

item.title: Exacerbated warming in the High Mountain Asia
item.description:
Following the release of my first scientific paper on climate change in the Himalayas and the Tibetan Plateau (using the latest generation of CMIP6 models), here is a general public summary published by my laboratory: https://hma.osug.fr/Exacerbated-warming-in-the-High-Mountain-Asia

Scientific article: Climate change in the High Mountain Asia in CMIP6

item.title: Climate change in the High Mountain Asia in CMIP6
item.description:
A big thank you to my laboratory ( Institut des Géosciences de l’Environnement) for the publication of news about this article:

  • French version: Réchauffement exacerbé dans les Hautes Montagnes d’Asie
  • English version: Exacerbated warming in the High Mountain Asia
